articles.description: On Tuesday, the Brooks Atkinson Theatre on West 47th Street was renamed the Lena Horne Theatre.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Brooklyn's very own Lena Horne is now the first Black woman to have a Broadway theater named after her.
On Tuesday, the Brooks Atkinson Theatre on West 47th Street was renamed the Lena H… [+2555 chars]

articles.title: Taylor Swift snags all Billboard Top 10 spots with 'Midnights' songs - The Washington Post
articles.description: “Midnights” turned Swift into the first artist to snag every one of the top 10 slots on the Billboard Hot 100 chart, all with songs from the 13-song album.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
